code: import{DayMilliseconds,MinuteMilliseconds}from"./Constants";var commonDayStart=function commonDayStart(date){var nowYear=date.getFullYear();var nowMonthIndex=date.getMonth();var nowMonthDay=date.getDate();var nowTimeZoneOffset=date.getTimezoneOffset()*MinuteMilliseconds;var dayStart=Date.UTC(nowYear,nowMonthIndex,nowMonthDay)+nowTimeZoneOffset;return dayStart;};export var dayNowStartMilliseconds=function dayNowStartMilliseconds(){var now=new Date();return commonDayStart(now);};export var dayTimestampStartMilliseconds=function dayTimestampStartMilliseconds(timestamp){var date=new Date(timestamp);return commonDayStart(date);};export var weekStartMilliseconds=function weekStartMilliseconds(){var weekStarts=[];var now=new Date();var dayStart=commonDayStart(now);var today=new Date().getDay();for(var day=today;day>=0;day--,dayStart-=DayMilliseconds){weekStarts[day]=dayStart;}for(var _day=6;_day>today;_day--,dayStart-=DayMilliseconds){weekStarts[_day]=dayStart;}return weekStarts;};export var datestampToMinute=function datestampToMinute(){var now=new Date();var nowYear=now.getFullYear();var nowMonthIndex=now.getMonth();var nowMonthDay=now.getDate();var nowHour=now.getHours();var nowMinute=now.getMinutes();var nowTimeZoneOffset=now.getTimezoneOffset()*MinuteMilliseconds;var dayStart=Date.UTC(nowYear,nowMonthIndex,nowMonthDay,nowHour,nowMinute)+nowTimeZoneOffset;return dayStart;};export var formatDate=function formatDate(dateTime){var year=dateTime.getFullYear()+'';var month=dateTime.getMonth()+1+'';var date=dateTime.getDate()+'';var hours=dateTime.getHours()+'';var minutes=dateTime.getMinutes()+'';var dateString="".concat(year)+"-".concat(month.padStart(2,'0'))+"-".concat(date.padStart(2,'0'))+" ".concat(hours.padStart(2,'0'))+":".concat(minutes.padStart(2,'0'));return dateString;};
